section.p: If you have the codeword Epistle, immediately. If not, read on.

You step into a huge library, known as the Archives of the Blue. Here you find the Master of the Documents of Fable, a little old man with a mask covered in strange sigils. The mask is so big that he has trouble holding up his head.
He tells you about the Grand Telling, a ceremonial competition held every year at court in which the courtier who can come up with the best story wins. The master wants you to write your life story.

'You adventurers always come up with the most extraordinary tales. Write me a real blockbuster, of suitable length, and I'll use it to win the Grand Telling. In return, I'll see that you are rewarded. You have eight weeks to complete your story. I expect you to work here, in the archives, so I can keep an eye on you.'
You reckon it should take about four to five weeks to finish.
